SELECT un.fUuid AS 'uuid', u.fUserName AS 'notesPerson', un.fCustomerUuid AS 'customerUuid', un.fContent AS 'content', un.fCreateTime AS 'createTime' FROM t_user_notebook un JOIN t_userinfo u ON u.fLoginName = un.fNotesPerson WHERE un.fCustomerUuid = #{customerUuid} AND un.fTerminalType = #{terminalType} ORDER BY un.fCreateTime DESC
LIMIT 3
